titles.title: Ending Taxpayer Subsidies for Yachts Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow the mortgage interest deduction with respect to boats only if the boat is used as the principal residence of the taxpayer.
Ending Taxpayer Subsidies for Yachts Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Ending Taxpayer Subsidies for Yachts Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to deny a tax deduction for interest paid on a mortgage for a second residence of a taxpayer if that residence is a boat.
